entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 07:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of snow except showers over southern sections. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow except showers over southern sections this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
